messages.content: Dear Voter, It’s 79 years since the Battle of Britain, fought to defend our nation from an authoritarian foreign power. This time we face not only the EU but our own political class who compliantly implement the will of Brussels by proxy. The EU is not about trade. It’s about political domination. Johnson’s EU-UK Withdrawal Agreement is 535 pages of UK commitments in return for nothing. This is not freedom, democracy, sovereignty or taking back control that we voted for but a Treaty of Vassalage and continued payments. LibDems and Labour have no intention of honoring the Referendum, openly showing their contempt for democracy. Vote UKIP to send our treacherous liar politicians a message they will never forget. Vote for Troy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that Brexit is fully executed without compromising UK sovereignty.
Take measures to curb mass immigration and control borders.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put our NHS before Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritize funding for the NHS over foreign aid spending.
Remove politicians who have lied or misled the public.
Eliminate the mandatory BBC licence fee.
Reclaim national sovereignty and decision-making powers.
Promote and protect British values and free speech.

mentions.candidate: send our treacherous liar politicians a message they will never forget. Vote for Troy.

This is not freedom, democracy, sovereignty or taking back control that we voted for but a Treaty of Vassalage and continued payments.

issues.immigration: Take measures to curb mass immigration and control borders.
